Module restaurant_system
Package main.Menu

Class Menu

java.lang.Object
main.Menu.Menu
public class Menu extends Object
Represents a menu that contains a list of menu items and promotions

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    Menu​(String menuName)
    Public constructor for Menu class, takes in a String parameter to store as the name of this menu

      public void updateItem()

      Removes a menu item from this menu using an integer index parameter
      Parameters:

    • findItem

      public MenuItem findItem​(int itemChoice)
      Allows adding menu items to orders
      Parameters:
      itemChoice - The array index of the menu to find the requested item
      Returns:
      itemToFind or null
